message.body: I think James tainted either the water filter or my water bottles in the fridge
That's weird what does it taste like
What is wrong with the water
The one I took to work taste like bleach or poison
That is pretty serious. Are you sure I couldn't have been dishwasher soap or something. If that's the case you may need to call the police
Yeah I need to taste my other bottles to be sure
I drank some water from the filter around 11 and feel feverish now but I didn't notice a strange taste
